name: Green Apple and Macadamia Quinoa
author: Kelly Wilcox
summary: Low-fat, so filling, and tasty! I double this recipe at the beginning of the week and it provides enough grab-and-go lunches for me and my husband for several days in the week.
ingredients: ¾ cup seeded and diced cucumber
½ cup diced green bell pepper
1 teaspoon agave nectar, or to taste
directions: Bring water and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender and water has been absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes
Heat a small skillet over medium heat; add macadamia nuts and cook, stirring often, until toasted, 3 to 4 minutes
Combine quinoa, macadamia nuts, apple, cucumber, green bell pepper, celery, lemon juice, green onion, garlic, agave nectar, and salt in a bowl
